agent_verifiable.description: Predictions the agent can verify using only its existing knowledge and reasoning capabilities, without any tools

examples.prediction: 2 + 2 equals 4
Christmas will fall on December 25th this year
The word 'hello' has 5 letters
Python is a programming language
A leap year occurs every 4 years

current_tool_verifiable.description: Predictions the agent can verify using tools it currently has access to (like current_time)

examples.prediction: It is currently after 3:00 PM
examples.verification_approach: Use current_time tool to check current time

examples.prediction: Today is Friday
examples.verification_approach: Use current_time tool to determine day of week

examples.prediction: We are in the month of June
examples.verification_approach: Use current_time tool to check current month

examples.prediction: The year is 2025
examples.verification_approach: Use current_time tool to verify current year

examples.prediction: It has been more than 1 hour since midnight
examples.verification_approach: Use current_time tool to calculate time elapsed since midnight

strands_tool_verifiable.description: Predictions the agent could verify if it had access to existing Strands tools from the strands_tools library

examples.prediction: The weather in New York is currently sunny
examples.verification_approach: Use weather tool to check current conditions

examples.prediction: Bitcoin is currently trading above $50,000
The S&P 500 closed above 5000 yesterday
There are currently no major earthquakes reported today
The USD to EUR exchange rate is below 0.95

api_tool_verifiable.description: Predictions that could be verified through MCP servers, APIs, or custom tools that could be written

examples.prediction: Flight AA1234 is currently delayed
GitHub is currently experiencing service issues
There are more than 100 new posts on Reddit's r/technology today
examples.verification_approach: Query Reddit API for post count

examples.prediction: The latest iPhone model is currently in stock at the Apple Store
examples.required_integration: Apple Store API or web scraping

examples.prediction: There have been more than 1000 commits to the React repository this month
examples.verification_approach: Query GitHub API for commit history

human_verifiable_only.description: Predictions that can only be verified through human observation, personal experience, or manual confirmation

examples.prediction: Miriam will be home by 3:00 PM
examples.verification_approach: Direct observation or communication with Miriam

examples.prediction: The meeting will be productive
I will enjoy the movie tonight
The restaurant will have good service
My friend will call me back today

category_definitions.strands_tool_verifiable: Requires existing Strands tools from library
category_definitions.api_tool_verifiable: Requires custom API integration or MCP server
category_definitions.human_verifiable_only: Requires human observation or subjective assessment

test_metadata.purpose: Refined verifiability categorization based on agent capabilities and tool availability
